tooltips.ahaScore: Your personalized relevance score. Combines AI analysis with freshness, novelty, and your preferences. Higher = more relevant to you right now.
tooltips.aiScore: AI's assessment of how relevant this item is to your topic (0-100). This raw score is then adjusted by freshness, novelty, and your preferences.
tooltips.novelty: How unique this content is compared to what you've seen recently. Higher = more novel information.
tooltips.freshness: How recent this content is. Older items gradually fade to make room for new ones.
tooltips.sourceWeight: Priority multiplier for this source. Sources you trust more can be weighted higher.
tooltips.userPreferences: Boosts applied based on your liked sources and authors.
tooltips.categories: Topics the AI identified in this content.
tooltips.feedbackLike: Mark as interesting - helps surface similar content in the future.
tooltips.feedbackDislike: Mark as not relevant - helps filter out similar content.
tooltips.sourceHN: Hacker News - tech news and community discussions.
tooltips.sourceSignal: X/Twitter search signal via Grok AI.
tooltips.sourcesInterval: How often this source is checked for new content.
tooltips.sourcesWeight: Priority multiplier for items from this source (1.0 = normal).
tooltips.clusterSources: This topic has coverage from {count} sources. Expand 'Why shown' below to see all related sources.
tooltips.relatedSources: Multiple sources covered this topic. Similarity % shows how related each source is to the main item.
